title: 3 Bedroom Family House
shortDescription: A warm and welcoming family home featuring three spacious bedrooms, a bright living area, and a private garden. Ideal for families looking for comfort, space, and a peaceful residential vibe.

title: Modern 2 Bedroom Flat
shortDescription: A stylish and modern two-bedroom flat with an open-plan layout and excellent access to public transport. Perfect for professionals or small families who enjoy a contemporary urban lifestyle.

title: 4 Bedroom Detached House
shortDescription: A large detached house offering four generous bedrooms, multiple living spaces, and a calm, quiet atmosphere. Ideal for growing families who value privacy and space.

title: 3 Bedroom City Flat
shortDescription: A vibrant city flat with three bedrooms, located close to shops, caf√©s, and entertainment. Perfect for people who enjoy fast-paced city living with everything within walking distance.

title: Luxury 5 Bedroom House
shortDescription: A high-end luxury home with five spacious bedrooms, modern interiors, and premium finishes throughout. Designed for comfort and elegance, offering an upscale and sophisticated lifestyle.

title: 1 Bedroom Studio Flat
shortDescription: A compact and cozy studio flat with smart use of space, ideal for students or single professionals. Offers a simple, low-maintenance living experience in a convenient location.

title: 3 Bedroom Semi-Detached House
shortDescription: A comfortable semi-detached home with three bedrooms, offering a balance of privacy and community living. Ideal for families seeking a calm neighbourhood with a friendly atmosphere.
